title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 201.11 - Opportunity to testify and cross-examine; issuance of subpoenas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 201.11 - Opportunity to testify and cross-examine; issuance of subpoenas

State Regulations

An applicant shall be afforded reasonable opportunity to present testimony under
oath, or other evidence relevant and material to the subject matter of the hearing, and to cross-examine any witnesses who testify at such hearing. At reasonable request of an applicant, the hearing officer shall issue subpoenas to compel the attendance of witnesses and the giving of testimony or
production of other evidence. The applicant shall effect his own service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
201.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
